</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	56
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="3">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage57"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Year Ended December&#160;31, 2014 Compared to Year Ended December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Revenues
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Our total revenues decreased by $3.4 million, or 23.3%, from $14.5 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2014 to $11.1 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2015.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Total revenues include (i) research and development payments, including up-front payments, and (ii) share purchase related revenues. We anticipate that in the long term, our primary sources of revenues and profits will be future royalties and other revenue sharing amounts from current and future collaborations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(i) Revenues from research and development payments include periodic payments for research and development services generated under our collaboration agreements primarily with seed companies, as well as up-front payments received under these agreements, which are recognized as revenues over the duration of the relevant agreement. R&amp;D revenues for 2015 were $11 million, compared to $14.2 million for 2014. The decline was primarily related to the amendment to our collaboration work plans with Bayer and Syngenta.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(ii) Share purchase related revenues result from the required accounting treatment for the past acquisitions of Evogene ordinary shares by Monsanto and Bayer, as well as the put option agreement that we entered into with Monsanto, all in conjunction with the research and development collaboration agreements signed with these partners. Share purchase related revenues for 2015 were $0.2 million, compared to $0.3 million in 2014.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Cost of Revenues
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Cost of revenues decreased by $1.4 million, or 15%, to $8.3 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2015 from $9.7 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2014. The decline primarily related to the reduced levels of activity as a result of the amendments in the work plans under our collaborations with Bayer and Syngenta, as described above.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Gross Profit
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Gross profit decreased by $1.9 million, or 40.1%, to $2.9 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2015 from $4.8 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2014. This decrease was mainly a result of the decrease in the activity under our collaborations, as described above.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Operating Expenses
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Research and Development Expenses, net.
</FONT>
	Research and development expenses increased by $0.4 million, or 3.0%, to $14.4 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2015 from $14.0 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2014. The increase in these expenses largely derives from (i) the expansion in self-funded activities, mainly in our key growth engines &#8211; insect control including our new U.S. site expanses, ag-chemicals, and ag-biologicals (ii) an increase in non-cash share-based compensation expenses. These increases were partially offset by the increase in the exchange rate USD/ILS reducing the company&#8217;s ILS expenses in terms of USD.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Business Development Expenses
</FONT>
	. Business development expenses increased by $0.1 million, or 6.1%, to $2.0 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2015 from $1.9 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2014. The increase mainly related to an increase in non-cash share-based compensation which was offset in part by a decrease in salaries and benefits.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	General and Administrative Expenses.
</FONT>
	General and administrative expenses increased by $0.2 million, or 4.7%, to $4.4 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2015 from $4.2 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2014. This increase was primarily attributable to an increase in professional fees.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Financing Income and Expenses, Net.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Financing Income.
</FONT>
	Financing income increased by $0.4 million, or 14.7%, to $2.6 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2015 from $2.2 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2014. This increase was primarily attributable to an increase in interest income.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE">
	Financing Expenses
</FONT>
	. Financing expenses increased by $0.4 million, or 22.9% to $1.9 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2015 from $1.5 million for the year ended December&#160;31, 2014. This increase was primarily attributable to the changes in the fair value of marketable securities we hold.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
